Hello.

This is an offer which does not relate to hosting but web designing.

We do modern Website Designs with the most competetive prices, ever.

All Web Designs are fully modern, responsive, unique, white-label[no design by tag or such] and all rights will go to the client.[You can even sell it afterwards if you wish.]

To give some general pricing[maybe less maybe more depending on preferations and specifications ofcourse].

One page / landing page design + logo that fits web design/company = 120$
Full website design [5-6 pages] + logo that fits web design/company = 400$
Full website design [5-6 pages] + logo that fits web design/company + WHMCS integration! = 500$

Here are a few examples of our work: https://mjeshtri.im/ , https://noamweb.com/ , https://wisegroupcenter.com/ … etc.

Send me a PM, or contact us here

Regards, Armand
